roleset.name: to render unnecessary

example.name: transitive
example.text: He said that even though virtually all corn seeds currently planted [*] are hybrids , the genetic approach will obviate the need for mechanical emasculation of anthers , which [*T*-38]costs U.S. seed producers about $ 70 million [*U*] annually .
example.arg: though virtually all corn seeds currently planted [*] are hybrids
the need for mechanical emasculation of anthers , which [*T*-38]costs U.S. seed producers about $ 70 million [*U*] annually

roleset.note: OBVIATE-V NOTES: Frames file for 'obviate' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from obviate.01-v predicate notes)
